ew-extension.name: TimePicker
ew-extension.author: e.World
ew-extension.description:
Use jquery.timepicker as time picker. Developer Website: http://jonthornton.github.io/jquery-timepicker/ jquery.timepicker is available under MIT License.
Settings: - TimeFormat (Uses the time portion of PHP's date formatting commands) - Step (Generate drop-down options with varying levels of precision) - Options (JSON notation representing additional options of jquery.timepicker)
Note: The jquery.timepicker is not part of PHPMaker. Please read "Third-Party Tools" in the help file.
